comment: Good teacher, really into climbing, and tries to be there to help. Sometimes disorganized, expectations are low but unclear.

I personally wish he had posted grades and allowed us to know our standing in the class. There are a good deal of assignments and if you're unfamiliar with rock climbing there's a ton to memorize that can make this class hard. I don't really recommend this guy, but he's the only rock climbing professor so you're not left with many other choices.

Professor Armocida was an exceptional teacher who knows exactly what he is talking about. His class is mandatory attendance but everyday was filled with fun activities! We also learned how to belay and spot properly. Definitely take this class.
There's nothing better than a beautiful, bearded nomad teaching a rock climbing class. Participate and enjoy the joyous teaching style. Professor Armocida makes the class worth coming too and FUN
Come to class, do your work and all will be right with the world.
